citations.narrative:
While reviewing the acquisition and disposition records it was noted that all of the required information is not being
collected. Several small animals / pocket pets have been acquired since the last inspection. However, the date they were
acquired, the name, address, USDA #, License plate # of the person they were acquired from was not being documented.
All information needs to be obtained and documented.
***To Be Corrected By: November 13, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section
